title: Rep. Michael Johnson, Economic Recovery Plan, China
itunes:title: Rep. Michael Johnson, Economic Recovery Plan, China
description:
Guests: Josh Wingove, Bloomberg White House reporter, Congressman Michael Johnson, a Republican representing Louisiana’s 4th congressional district and Chairman of the House Republican Study Committee, and Guy Snodgrass, CEO of Defense Analytics, former director of communications and chief speechwriter to Secretary of Defense James Mattis and author of “Holding the Line: Inside Trump’s Pentagon with Secretary Mattis.” 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
